alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 4:58AM MST until March 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow showers continue this morning for northwest Arizona. Showery snow will persist through the day and spread eastward, before heavier snow showers develop once again Thursday afternoon and evening. Snow levels will fall as low as 4500 feet, but significant accumulation will be above 6000 feet. Expect southwest winds to gust up to 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake and North Rim. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST /3 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will especially impact driving conditions early Thursday morning and Thursday evening. Additional snow forecast from 4 AM Today to 8 PM Today: Grand Canyon 1 to 2 inches Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches North Rim 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons
